alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 7:41AM CDT until April 05 at 8:15AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CDT FOR EASTERN ELMORE AND SOUTHEASTERN TALLAPOOSA COUNTIES... At 740 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Eclectic, or 8 miles west of Tallassee, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wetumpka, Tallassee, Dadeville, Eclectic, Martin Dam, Liberty City, Reeves Airport, Tallapoosa City, Emerald Mountain, Southern Lake Martin, Still Waters Resort, Blue Ridge, Eastern Lake Martin, Claud, Susannah Crossing, Maxwell Gunter Recreation Area, Yates Dam, Blue Creek Marina, Ware and Reeltown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for south central, southeastern and east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
